body:
## ðŸ“š Documentation Task

### Overview
Update and improve API documentation for all student-related endpoints to ensure clarity and completeness.

### Current State
- Basic endpoints documented
- Missing request/response examples
- No error code documentation
- Authentication requirements not clear

### Required Updates

#### Students Controller Documentation
- [ ] GET /api/students - List all students
- [ ] GET /api/students/{id} - Get student by ID
- [ ] POST /api/students - Create new student
- [ ] PUT /api/students/{id} - Update student
- [ ] DELETE /api/students/{id} - Delete student

#### For Each Endpoint Document:
- [ ] Request parameters and body structure
- [ ] Response body examples (success and error)
- [ ] HTTP status codes
- [ ] Authentication requirements
- [ ] Validation rules
- [ ] Rate limiting information

#### Additional Documentation
- [ ] Update Swagger/OpenAPI specifications
- [ ] Add Postman collection
- [ ] Create developer guide for student API
- [ ] Add code examples in multiple languages

### Documentation Standards
- Use clear and concise language
- Include practical examples
- Follow REST API documentation best practices
- Ensure consistency with existing documentation

### Tools
- Swagger/OpenAPI 3.0
- Postman for collection
- Markdown for developer guides

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All student endpoints fully documented
- [ ] Swagger UI displays complete information
- [ ] Postman collection created and tested
- [ ] Developer guide published
- [ ] Team review completed

### Priority
Medium - Important for developer experience
